Segment.name: T3
Segment.comment: To specify transit inbound routing, including equipment identifications for associated T1 and T2 segments

Field.name: AssignedNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: RoutingSequenceCode
Field.comment: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)
